# The `StringLiteral` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A wrapper around a string literal that serves as a proxy for constructing global tables of StringRefs with the length computed at compile time. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A wrapper around a string literal that serves as a proxy for constructing global tables of StringRefs with the length computed at compile time.

In order to avoid the invocation of a global constructor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringliteral">StringLiteral</a> should <em>only</em> be used in a constexpr context, as such:

constexpr <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringliteral">StringLiteral</a> S(&quot;test&quot;);

Definition at line 853 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stringref-h">StringRef.h</a>.
